H0.text: The chemical compound Thujone is best known for being present in which alcoholic drink. Absinthe Substitute

H1.text: The chemical compound Thujone is best known for being present in which alcoholic drink. Ouzo

H2.text: The chemical compound Thujone is best known for being present in which alcoholic drink. Sambuca

H3.text: The chemical compound Thujone is best known for being present in which alcoholic drink. Apsinth

A4.text: Past reports estimated thujone concentrations in absinthe as being up to 260 mg/kg.

A5.text: For the average 65 kg (143 lb) man, the high dose samples in the study would equate to 18.2 mg of thujone.
